inlineContent.text: Browse notable changes in
Apple Watch Series 10 are larger and have a different aspect ratio than previous watches. The watch is 1mm larger than the Series 9 (42mm and 46mm), but the screen gains more width than height. Use
to align text with the text margins, and
to extend content beyond the watchâ€™s safe area.
Apple Watch Series 10 supports the Shallow Depth and Pressure capability. Use
to start a shallow dive session, and
and
to read depth and temperature samples from HealthKit.
Access water temperature data from swimming workouts. Apple Watch Ultra records
samples during swimming workouts.
Specify which control responds to the double tap gesture using the
view modifier, passing
as the parameter. Double tap can interact with any buttonlike controls, such as buttons or toggles.

activity.

goal.

When someone performs a Double Tap gesture while viewing
a notification on Apple Watch Series 9 or Apple Watch Ultra 2,
the system invokes the first nondestructive action. A nondestructive action doesnâ€™t include the
option, and wonâ€™t delete user data or change the app irrevocably.
Use the new watchOS user interface design to simplify navigation, better use the Digital Crown, and enrich the app experience. For more information, see
and

Update your WidgetKit-based complications to take advantage of the Smart Stack on Apple Watch. People can scroll down to see relevant widgets directly on the watch face using the Digital Crown. For more information, see
Use curved text along the bevel or around the corners in WidgetKit-based complications.
Add state preservation and restoration to watchOS apps. For more information, see

Use WorkoutKit to create goal, pacer, multisport, and fully custom interval workouts. Display a preview of the workout that shows the workout details, and sync workouts with a paired Apple Watch. For more information, see

Access batches of high-frequency accelerometer and device motion data during workouts. Use this data to analyze motion â€” such as a golf or baseball swing â€” after the action occurs. For more information, see
Use Core Motionâ€™s water submersion manager to monitor shallow dives on Apple Watch Ultra. For more information, see

Support Bluetooth cycling sensors. People can pair power, cadence, and speed sensors to Apple Watch to enhance their cycling workouts. You can access this data using HealthKit for live and historical workouts.
